column4: Hm... weird. I am doing sudo apt-get distupgrade on Gutsy (Slicehost) and nothing happens. Isn't it supposed to upgrade to Hardy?
If you open update-manager and click the Check button, does it show you there is an upgrade available?
I am on a comnand-line system
the command to upgrade is sudo update-manager -d.  If that doesn't work.. I don't know
